Package doa.engine.sound

Class DoaSounds

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.sound.DoaSounds
public final class DoaSounds
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for providing a Factory to create DoaAudioClips for DoaEngine to play. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
Since:
DoaEngine 1.1
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​DoaSoundClip> SOUND_CLIPS
    Collection that maps Strings(clipNames) to DoaSoundClips.

  • Field Details

    • SOUND_CLIPS

      public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​DoaSoundClip> SOUND_CLIPS
      Collection that maps Strings(clipNames) to DoaSoundClips.

  • Method Details

    • setGlobalVolume

      public static void setGlobalVolume​(float newVolume)
      Sets the global volume level. The parameter newVolume must be in the range [0, 1]. When newVolume = 0, volume is mute. When newVolume = 1, volume is max. When newVolume = 0.5, volume is midpoint of mute and max.
      Parameters:
      newVolume - the new value of the global volume level
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if newVolume is not in range [0, 1]

    • createSoundClip

      public static DoaSoundClip createSoundClip​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String soundName, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String soundFile) throws java.io.IOException, javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException, javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
      Creates a new DoaSoundClip, adds the created clip toDoaSounds.SOUND_CLIPS, and returns the newly created clip.
      Parameters:
      soundName - unique name of the sprite that will be created
      soundFile - path to the sprite on the disk
      Returns:
      the DoaSoundClip in DoaSounds.SOUND_CLIPS which has a name of soundFile
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if file cannot be loaded by DoaEngine
      javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the file does not contain valid data of a recognized filetype and format. Recognized filetypes include, but are not limited to; .mp3, .wav and .ogg.
      javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if a line cannot be opened because it is unavailable. This situation arises most commonly when a requested line is already in use by another application.

    • getSoundClip

      public static DoaSoundClip getSoundClip​(java.lang.String soundName)
      Conveniency method. This method exists solely to reduce the amount of typing required while trying to retrieve a DoaSoundClip from DoaSounds class. Calling this method is equivalent to calling: DoaSounds.SOUND_CLIPS.get(soundName);
      Parameters:
      soundName - name of the sprite that is trying to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the DoaSoundClip in DoaSounds.SOUND_CLIPS which has a name of soundName
